amendment.description: To restore sections of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2107 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 41. Record Vote Number: 224.

action.text: Amendment SA 2107 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Tester to Amendment SA 2089. (consideration: CR S4827, S4830-4831; text: CR S4827) To restore sections of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965.
